exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat f, g : nat -> nat Unable to unify "∑ ?M1528 (fun i : nat => ?M1529 i * power (?M1531 i) 4) ⇣ ∑ ?M1528 (fun i : nat => ?M1530 i * power (?M1531 i) 4) = ∑ ?M1528 (fun i : nat => ?M1529 i ⇣ ?M1530 i * power (?M1531 i) 4)" with "∑ n f * ∑ n g = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * g i) + ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => f i * g j + f j * g i))".

original: apply meet_sum_powers with (q := 2) (r := 4). - lia. - apply sum_powers_binary_le_inv with (q := 2) (r := 4) (f := g) (e := fun x => x) (m := 0). + lia. + intros. lia. + intros. lia. + assert (sum g <= sum f). * apply sum_0n_mono. intros. lia. * lia. - apply sum_0n_distr_in_out with (a := f) (b := g).
